mapper.select: SELECT (row_num - (:page - 1) * :num) AS row_num, id, title, description, created_at, tag_id, tag_name, category_id, category_name FROM ( SELECT @row_num := IF(@prev_id = E.id, @row_num, @row_num + 1) AS row_num, @prev_id := E.id, E.id, E.title, E.description, E.created_at, T.id AS tag_id, T.name AS tag_name, C.id AS category_id, C.name AS category_name FROM T_Entry E CROSS JOIN (SELECT @row_num := 0) ROW_NUM CROSS JOIN (SELECT @prev_id := 0) PREV_ID LEFT JOIN M_EntryTag ET ON ET.entry_id = E.id LEFT JOIN M_Tag T on T.id = ET.tag_id LEFT JOIN M_Category C ON C.id = E.category_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND (ISNULL(:entry_id) OR E.id = :entry_id) AND (ISNULL(:tag_name) OR T.name = :tag_name) AND (ISNULL(:category_name) OR C.name = :category_name) AND (ISNULL(:created_at) OR SUBSTRING(E.created_at, 1, 7) = :created_at) AND (ISNULL(:query) OR MATCH (E.title, E.description) AGAINST(:query IN BOOLEAN MODE) <> 0) ) AS TBL WHERE TBL.row_num > (:page - 1) * :num AND TBL.row_num <= :page * :num;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM ( SELECT E.id FROM T_Entry E LEFT JOIN M_EntryTag ET ON ET.entry_id = E.id LEFT JOIN M_Tag T on T.id = ET.tag_id LEFT JOIN M_Category C ON C.id = E.category_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND (ISNULL(:entry_id) OR E.id = :entry_id) AND (ISNULL(:tag_name) OR T.name = :tag_name) AND (ISNULL(:category_name) OR C.name = :category_name) AND (ISNULL(:created_at) OR SUBSTRING(E.created_at, 1, 7) = :created_at) AND (ISNULL(:query) OR MATCH (E.title, E.description) AGAINST(:query IN BOOLEAN MODE) <> 0) GROUP BY E.id ) AS TBL
SELECT SUBSTRING(created_at, 1, 7) AS month, COUNT(*) AS count FROM T_Entry GROUP BY month DESC
SELECT T.name, COUNT(*) AS count FROM M_Tag T INNER JOIN M_EntryTag ET ON T.id = ET.tag_id GROUP BY T.id
